title: James Harden Thinks the Media Settles on MVP Narratives Too Soon. Is He Right? | Group Chat
description:
We play a game of ‘Is This a Thing?’ with a slew of offseason story lines, including: James Harden’s comments about how the media chooses the MVP, the Orlando Magic’s locked-in roster, the outlook for Team USA in the 2020 Olympics, Isaiah Thomas’s injury, and Lonzo Ball and Brandon Ingram’s potential as a young duo.

Hosts: Justin Verrier and Danny Chau

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
